translation: Those who did not dare to break the thread doggedly;

gurmukhi: iqn isau aun Boj ikE iekTM ]
transliteration: Tin Siu Oun Bhoj Kio Ikathan||
translation: The two refugee kings dined together with them.
Them the spies went and told (the king Ajai Singh),

gurmukhi: ien mY aun mY iek Bydu rihE ]14]304]
transliteration: In Mai Oun Mai Ik Bhed(u) Rahio||14||304||
translation: There is one difference between the former and the latter.14.304.

gurmukhi: puin boil auiTE niRp srb idjM ]
transliteration: Poun(i) Bol(i) Outhio Nrip Sarab Dijan||
translation: Then the king (Ajai Singh) addressed all his Brahmins:

gurmukhi: nih CqR qu dyh suqwih quAM ]
transliteration: Nah(i) Chhatra Tu Deh Soutaah(i) Tuan||
translation: “If there is no Kshatriya amongst them, then give your daughters in marriage to them.”

gurmukhi: mirgy sun bwq mno sB hI ]
transliteration: Marige Soun Baat Mano Sabh Hee||
translation: Hearing these words none replied as though they were dead.

gurmukhi: auT kY giH jwq Bey qb hI ]15]305]
transliteration: Outh Kai Grih Jaat Bhae Tah Hee||15||305||
translation: Then they got up and went away to their homes.15.305.
Then all gathered to take a decision.

gurmukhi: sB sok ky swgr bIc fuby ]
transliteration: Sabh Sok Ke Saagad Beech Doube||
translation: All of them seemed to have been drowned in the ocean of sorrow.

gurmukhi: vih bwD bihT Aiq qyaU hTM ]
transliteration: Vah(i) Baadh Bahith At(i) Teoo Hathan||
translation: He (Ajai Singh) wants to bind his brothers and the Brahmins were full of persistence,

gurmukhi: hm ey doaU BRwq clY iekTM ]16]306]
transliteration: Ham E Dooo Bhraat Chalai Ikathan||16||306||
translation: We shall all side together with the brothers.’16.306.

gurmukhi: hT kIn idjY iqn lIn suqw ]
transliteration: Hath Keen Dijai Tin Leen Soutaa||
translation: The Sanaudh Brahmin persisted in not returning the refugee brothers, then the king Ajai Singh married his daughter.

gurmukhi: Aiq rUp mhwN Cib prm pRBw ]
transliteration: At(i) Roopp Mahaan Chhab(i) Param Prabhaa||
translation: She was very beautiful, winsome and glorious.
